item.title: Todays food post
item.description:
Todays food post

I get a lot of questions about what I eat? How I've lost all the baby weight? What diet am I on? ---------------------------------------------- Answer: I don't diet! I eat well. I live a healthy lifestyle. Typically I follow a rule of 80:20 and that's what I help other people do too! Do I feel guilty when I eat chocolate? Have a glass of wine? No way!! I enjoy themðŸ˜Š --------------------------------------------- Today's breakfast...Meal #2 is grilled asparagus (1 green), quinoa (1 yellow) and two hard boiled eggs (1 red). --------------------------------------------- If you want help with eating clean and improving your lifestyle, join my free clean eating group. Starts Monday!! Leave your email below, DM or email me at melissabourdages4fitness@gmail.com ðŸ’•

item.title: Seared salmon salad with a balsamic & capers dressing.
item.description:
Seared salmon salad with a balsamic & capers dressing.

After a few too many sweets this weekend I'm looking forward to getting back on track! Seared salmon salad with a balsamic & capers dressing. Next time we'll add a pop more colour to this salad.

item.title: Title 1
item.description:
Title 1

Health & Fitness Coach, Mompreneur & Business Mentor - Posting daily health, fitness & nutrition tips - to help you be a healthier, happier & stronger YOU!

item.title: Melissa Bourdages
item.description:
Melissa Bourdages

There are several benefits of having a good diet, such as improved mood, helps fight disease, boosts energy and helps with weight loss.

item.title: Spinach Salad with Quinoa, Chickpeas, & Paprika Dressing
item.description:
Spinach Salad with Quinoa, Chickpeas, & Paprika Dressing

Who has a hard time getting all their greens?? We definitely do...so are going to be trying this salad. Even with the dressing the salad doesn't get soggy so you can prep ahead!! And cost per serving is under $2! Who says eating clean is expensive? ------------------------------------------------

item.title: Summit 2014 - Vegas
item.description:
Summit 2014 - Vegas

Summit 2014 was AMAZING! I had the opportunity to learn from so many successful people about their stories, how they built their business, the lives they helped changed and I was completely inspired and blown away.
